## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with [x] -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### TypeScript

- [ ] No use of `any` type (or properly justified)
- [ ] All new types are properly defined
- [ ] All new interfaces are exported where appropriate

### React

- [ ] All `useEffect` hooks have proper dependencies
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders
- [ ] Components follow project structure
- [ ] Props are properly typed

### Security

- [ ] All user inputs are sanitized
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Environment variables used for secrets

### Performance

- [ ] No performance regressions
- [ ] Images optimized (if applicable)
- [ ] Code splitting implemented (if applicable)
- [ ] Bundle size impact considered

### Accessibility

- [ ] ARIA labels added where needed
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards
- [ ] Screen reader tested (if UI changes)
